sentences.english: Saturday was the representative work of periodicals of civil literature in early Minguo.
sentences.chinese: 《礼拜六》是民国初年市民文学期刊的代表作。

sentences.english: Anze In two years, said Fu.
Usury of the Gansu-Ningxia-Qinghai rural in Republican China aroused a multifaceted social impact.
sentences.chinese: 高利贷对民国时期甘宁青社会的深刻影响是多方面的。

sentences.english: Dayuan in Beijing was a private garden created by a warlord during 1919-1922.
sentences.chinese: 北京达园是民国初年军阀王怀庆所筑的私家花园。

sentences.english: From the end of Qing dynasty to Minguo, Miyun Manchu City was gradually ruined.
sentences.chinese: 从清末至民国时期，密云“满城”逐渐走向了消亡。

sentences.english: The Republic of Korea deserves our full support.
sentences.chinese: 大韩民国值得我们的全力支持。

sentences.english: Overtime payment shall be computed in accordance with the Labor Standards Law of R. O. C.
sentences.chinese: 超时工作报酬计算方式，依中华民国劳动基准法。

sentences.english: Yuanlin is a building cluster of the early year in Republic in our country.
sentences.chinese: 袁林是我国民国初年的一座官式建筑群。

sentences.english: I declare that I do not hold overseas Chinese status or ROC citizenship.
sentences.chinese: 本人保证未具侨生身份且不具中华民国国籍。

sentences.english: This contract shall be construed in accordance with and governed by the laws of the R. O. C.
sentences.chinese: 本契约之解释与履行应以中华民国法律为准据法。

sentences.english: The president of R. O. C. are selected by all voters.
sentences.chinese: 中华民国总统是由民选产生。

sentences.english: It must pledge to abide by the ROC Securities and Exchange Act and related regulations, directives, and policies.
sentences.chinese: 遵守中华民国证券交易法及相关法令政策规定。

sentences.english: "Cong" people "-Chun Man", that is, "Yuzhou Man" and the "Liao" originated with "Pu" Family.
sentences.chinese: 阎锡山幕僚是民国时期一个重要的军人幕僚群体。

sentences.english: The Republic of Korea has made extraordinary progress.
sentences.chinese: 大韩民国取得了非凡的进步。

sentences.english: This Shanghai newspaper from 1912 is full of articles commemorating the first anniversary of the Republic.
sentences.chinese: 民国元年上海民立报上，有许多纪念国庆周年的文章。

sentences.english: Wan Sheng Rice Firm is an old and famous rice shop, founded in early 1911.
sentences.chinese: 万盛米行是一间老字号米铺，始建于民国初年。

definition: the final years of the Ch'ing or Qing dynasty/China at the turn of the 20th century
the late Qing and early Republic, i.e. China around 1911
the late Qing/late 19th and early 20th century China
the Ch'ing or Qing dynasty (1644-1911)
Xinhai Revolution (1911), which ended the Qing Dynasty
Republic of China
reign name of penultimate Qing emperor Guangxu or Guang-hsu (1875-1908)
reign name (1909-1911) of the last Qing emperor Pu Yi 溥儀|溥仪
Ch'ing or Qing dynasty (1644-1911)

the not-very-distant past/modern times, excluding recent decades/(in the context of Chinese history) the period from the Opium Wars until the May 4th Movement (mid-19th century to 1919)/capitalist times (pre-1949)
the Northern Warlords (1912-1927)
the Warlord government of Northern China that developed from the Qing Beiyang army 北洋軍閥|北洋军阀 after the Xinhai revolution of 1911
Nationalist government 1920s-1949 under Chiang Kai-shek 蔣介石|蒋介石
the Qing Dynasty name for the coastal provinces of Liaoning, Hebei, and Shandong
the Ming (1368-1644) and Qing (1644-1911) dynasties
Dr Sun Yat-sen (1866-1925), first president of the Republic of China and co-founder of the Guomintang 國民黨|国民党/same as 孫逸仙|孙逸仙
